25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ikrimah: The Holy Prophet (ﷺ) said to Ibn Suriya': I remind you by Allah Who saved you from the people of Pharaoh, made you cover the sea, gave you the shade of clouds, sent down to you manna and quails, sent down you Torah to Moses, do you find stoning (for adultery) in your Book? He said: You have reminded me by the Great. It is not possible for me to belie you. He then transmitted the rest of the tradition

chapter.eng-name: How should a dhimmi be asked to swear an oath?
